sentences.sContent: Actually, it does not have to do this while there are enough grassroots on sand for them to survive through dry season.
sentences.sContent_eng: Actually, it does not have to do this while there are enough grassroots on sand for them to survive through dry season.
sentences.sCn: 其实，沙鼠不用往自己的洞里叼，沙地上的草根足以使它们度过旱季的，可沙鼠们不这样做便焦虑不安。

sentences.sContent: You have to join the party at grassroots level from what I understand.
sentences.sCn: 据我的了解，你得由基层组织入党。

trans.tranOther: The grassroots of an organization or movement are the ordinary people who form the main part of it, rather than its leaders
